tool.name: qiime2 demux emp-single
tool.description: Demultiplex sequence data generated with the EMP protocol.

param.name: seqs
param.label: seqs: RawSequences | EMPSingleEndSequences | EMPPairedEndSequences
param.help: [required] The single-end sequences to be demultiplexed.

param.name: type
param.label: barcodes: MetadataColumn[Categorical]
param.help: [required] The sample metadata column containing the per-sample barcodes.

validator.message: The first column cannot be selected (they are IDs).

param.name: golay_error_correction
param.label: golay_error_correction: Bool
param.help: [default: Yes] Perform 12nt Golay error correction on the barcode reads.

param.name: rev_comp_barcodes
param.label: rev_comp_barcodes: Bool
param.help: [default: No] If provided, the barcode sequence reads will be reverse complemented prior to demultiplexing.

param.name: rev_comp_mapping_barcodes
param.label: rev_comp_mapping_barcodes: Bool
param.help: [default: No] If provided, the barcode sequences in the sample metadata will be reverse complemented prior to demultiplexing.

param.name: ignore_description_mismatch
param.label: ignore_description_mismatch: Bool
param.help: [default: No] If enabled, ignore mismatches in sequence record description fields.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: demux emp-single ========================= Demultiplex sequence data generated with the EMP protocol.
Outputs: -------- :per_sample_sequences.qza: The resulting demultiplexed sequences. :error_correction_details.qza: Detail about the barcode error corrections.
|
Description: ------------ Demultiplex sequence data (i.e., map barcode reads to sample ids) for data generated with the Earth Microbiome Project (EMP) amplicon sequencing protocol. Details about this protocol can be found at http://www.earthmicrobiome.org/protocols-and-standards/
|
